tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_behavior_data (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 activity VARCHAR,
 light_intensity DECIMAL,
 temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
    user_id INT,
    preferred_scene_id INT,
    preference_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserBehaviorData(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (preferred_scene_id) REFERENCES LightingScenes(scene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior_data ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, action_timestamp TIMESTAMP, action_description TEXT )
CREATE TABLE lighting_scenes ( scene_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, scene_name TEXT, brightness FLOAT, color_temperature FLOAT )
CREATE TABLE user_lighting_preferences ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, preferred_scene_id UUID )
CREATE TABLE user_statistics ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, total_actions INT, productivity_score FLOAT )

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    behavior_description TEXT,
    behavior_date DATE,
    behavior_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE lighting_scenes (
    scene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brightness INT,
    color_temperature INT,
    fade_in_time INT,
    fade_out_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    preferred_scene_id INT REFERENCES lighting_scenes(scene_id),
    preferred_brightness INT,
    preferred_color_temperature INT,
    auto_adjust_brightness BOOLEAN,
    auto_adjust_color_temperature BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    activity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_duration INT
);
